                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Course List                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-666191" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<span>This page was last updated on August 30, 2017. You should always consult the <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/">Harvard Course Catalog search page</a> for the latest course information.  All courses counting towards Theater, Dance &amp; Media course requirements appear on these pages.  You may also sort by <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/studiopractical-courses">Studio/Practical courses</a> and <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/theoretical-courses">Theoretical courses</a>.  Please note, courses are listed alphabetically and continue onto additional pages.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-1039691" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/psp/hrvihprd/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%2C%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Afalse%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22(%20COMPLIT%20173%20)%20(ACAD_CAREER%3A%5C%22FAS%5C%22)%22%2C%22DeepLink%22%3Afalse%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Carmen and the Art of Seduction</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>COMPLIT 173</strong><br /><strong>John T. .front #box-os_news_latest-page .node-content{
padding-left:55px;
}
#box-os_events_upcoming-page .node-content {
    padding-left: 0px !important;
}
#main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 70px;
}
}
</style></div></div></div>  </div>

																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Director of Undergraduate Studies											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-profiles view-id-os_profiles view-display-id-page view-dom-id-8296908cffc82e85219b0280c7edbd6e">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <article id="node-698676" class="node node-person article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-sidebar_teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/deborah-d-foster" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/125832_1200947.jpg.400x410_q95_crop-smart_upscale.jpg?m=1500577765&amp;itok=HnRbDnDn" width="75" height="75" alt="Deborah D. Foster" title="Deborah D. Foster" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>  
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <h1  class="node-title" rel="nofollow"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/deborah-d-foster">Deborah D. Foster</a></h1><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-sidebar_teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Director of Undergraduate Studies (DUS) for Theater, Dance &amp; Media</div><div class="field-item odd">Senior Lecturer on Theater, Dance &amp; Media</div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      
      </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>

								  <!--sidebar first region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441903988" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt navigation"  module="boxes" delta="1441903988"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="active" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>
		</div>

<article id="node-1011576" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={"PageNumber"%3A1%2C"PageSize"%3A""%2C"SortOrder"%3A["IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT"]%2C"Facets"%3A[]%2C"Category"%3A"HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES"%2C"SearchPropertiesInResults"%3Atrue%2C"FacetsInResults"%3Atrue%2C"SaveRecent"%3Atrue%2C"TopN"%3A""%2C"SearchText"%3A"TDM 146"}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Dance on Camera: In Studio</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">

<article id="node-895696" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22french%2080%22%2C%22DeepLink%22%3Afalse}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">French Theater Across Time: An Introduction to Performance</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>FRENCH 80</strong><br /><strong>Sylvaine Guyot</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tues/Thurs, </strong>11:30am - 12:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Boylston 335 (Tuesdays), Farkas 203 (Thursdays)<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>24804  <strong>Course ID: </strong>109826  <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/french-theater-across-time-introduction-performance" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about French Theater Across Time: An Introduction to Performance</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{
top:15px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #columns {
    margin-top: 80px;
}
.os-image-caption{

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{

}

    margin-top: 80px;
}

}

    padding-left: 0;
}

margin-bottom:0;
}

font-weight:bold;
}

    font-weight: normal;
}

	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->

#layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy,

background-color:#444!important;
}

}

}

}

}
}
@media (max-width: 768px){

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

    font-size: 25px;

					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Classes											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-classes view-id-os_classes view-display-id-page view-dom-id-fa9b18d431323050ef30daf7078d86b1">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-704416" class="node node-class node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/junior-tutorial" rel="bookmark">Junior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Fall</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_1_160647_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>TDM 98</strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2015 Fall<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647<br /><strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>&#13;
<p><strong>Description: </strong>The junior tutorial is a unique opportunity for small groups of concentrators and a tutor to explore a creative or critical project.  The junior tutorial typically culminates in a longer project, which can be performance-based or critical/historical.</p>&#13;
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/junior-tutorial" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Junior Tutorial</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-704366" class="node node-class node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/drama-theater-theory" rel="bookmark">Drama, Theater, Theory</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Spring</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Ffq_coordinated_semester_yr%3D%26fq_school_nm%3D%26q%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_2_160648_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong></strong><strong>TDM 97</strong><br /><strong>Martin Puchner</strong><br />2016 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16403  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160648<br /><strong>Class Capacity: </strong>30 <strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>
<p><strong>Description: </strong>This sophomore tutorial of the concentration in Theater, Dance, and Media, explores the theater as a medium that brings together all the other arts, from architecture and design to literature and music, through readings, discussions, and exercises. We also consider the intellectual traditions connected to theater, including philosophy, politics, and sociology. Key texts include Plato, Euripides, Brecht, and Churchill; sessions at the Harvard Theater Collection.</p>
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to, concentrators.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-os-addthis" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_addthis no-title"  module="boxes" delta="os_addthis"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_addthis' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style "><a class="addthis_button_facebook"></a><a class="addthis_button_twitter"></a><a class="addthis_button_email"></a><a class="addthis_button_linkedin"></a><a class="addthis_button_google_plusone"></a></div></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">
		<!-- Three column 3x33 Gpanel -->
		
			<div class="at-panel gpanel panel-display footer clearfix">
								<div class="region region-footer-first"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1441904702" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441904702"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441904702' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<img height="137" width="475" alt="Footer logo" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-large" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_large/public/tdm/files/harvard_fas_theater_dance_media_signature_horizontal_large_rgb.png?m=1508253749&amp;itok=YxvP_pbe" title="" /></p>

<p>
	Theater, Dance &amp; Media<br />Farkas Hall<br />10-12 Holyoke Street<br />Cambridge, MA 02138<br />617-496-2796<br /><a href="mailto:tdm@fas.harvard.edu">tdm@fas.harvard.edu</a>
</p>
</div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>								<div class="region region-footer-third"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1441910396" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441910396"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

<meta name="description" content="TDM 97Martin Puchner2016 SpringClass Number: 16403  Course ID: 160648Class Capacity: 30 Consent Required: Instructor Description: This sophomore tutorial of the concentration in Theater, Dance, and Media, explores the theater as a medium that brings together all the other arts, from architecture and design to literature and music, through readings, discussions, and exercises. We also consider the intellectual traditions connected to theater, including philosophy, politics, and sociology. Key texts include Plato, Euripides, Brecht, and Churchill; sessions at the Harvard Theater Collection. Recommended Prep: Required of all, and limited to, concentrators." />
<meta property="og:description" content="TDM 97Martin Puchner2016 SpringClass Number: 16403  Course ID: 160648Class Capacity: 30 Consent Required: Instructor Description: This sophomore tutorial of the concentration in Theater, Dance, and Media, explores the theater as a medium that brings together all the other arts, from architecture and design to literature and music, through readings, discussions, and exercises. We also consider the intellectual traditions connected to theater, including philosophy, politics, and sociology. Key texts include Plato, Euripides, Brecht, and Churchill; sessions at the Harvard Theater Collection. Recommended Prep: Required of all, and limited to, concentrators." />

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes" >CLASSES</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Drama, Theater, Theory											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-704366" class="node node-class article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Spring</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong></strong><strong>TDM 97</strong><br /><strong>Martin Puchner</strong><br />2016 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16403  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160648<br /><strong>Class Capacity: </strong>30 <strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>
<p><strong>Description: </strong>This sophomore tutorial of the concentration in Theater, Dance, and Media, explores the theater as a medium that brings together all the other arts, from architecture and design to literature and music, through readings, discussions, and exercises. We also consider the intellectual traditions connected to theater, including philosophy, politics, and sociology. Key texts include Plato, Euripides, Brecht, and Churchill; sessions at the Harvard Theater Collection.</p>
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to, concentrators.<!--break--></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Link:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Ffq_coordinated_semester_yr%3D%26fq_school_nm%3D%26q%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_2_160648_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/courses/theater-dance-media" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes" >CLASSES</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Junior Tutorial											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-704416" class="node node-class article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Fall</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>TDM 98</strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2015 Fall<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647<br /><strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>
<p><strong>Description: </strong>The junior tutorial is a unique opportunity for small groups of concentrators and a tutor to explore a creative or critical project.  The junior tutorial typically culminates in a longer project, which can be performance-based or critical/historical.</p>
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to concentrators.</p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-above view-mode-full"><h2 class="field-label">Link:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_1_160647_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/courses/theater-dance-media" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-os_addthis' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="addthis_toolbox addthis_default_style "><a class="addthis_button_facebook"></a><a class="addthis_button_twitter"></a><a class="addthis_button_email"></a><a class="addthis_button_linkedin"></a><a class="addthis_button_google_plusone"></a></div></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

	<img height="137" width="475" alt="Footer logo" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-large" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_large/public/tdm/files/harvard_fas_theater_dance_media_signature_horizontal_large_rgb.png?m=1508253749&amp;itok=YxvP_pbe" title="" /></p>

  </div></div></div></div>				<div class="region region-footer-bottom"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1438974002" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_media no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1438974002"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{
top:15px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #columns {
    margin-top: 80px;
}
.os-image-caption{
line-height:22px;
}
.page-news #main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 0;
}
.page-news .node-title{
margin-bottom:0;
}
#boxes-box-1441905122 h1 a{
font-weight:bold;
}
.node-type-page .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb a {
    font-weight: normal;
}
.block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt.navigation ul {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;
    border-right: 1px solid #fff;
}
.view-id-os_profiles.view-display-id-page article h1 {

                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Course List                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-666191" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<span>This page was last updated on August 30, 2017. You should always consult the <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/">Harvard Course Catalog search page</a> for the latest course information.  All courses counting towards Theater, Dance &amp; Media course requirements appear on these pages.  You may also sort by <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/studiopractical-courses">Studio/Practical courses</a> and <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/theoretical-courses">Theoretical courses</a>.  Please note, courses are listed alphabetically and continue onto additional pages.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-1011576" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={"PageNumber"%3A1%2C"PageSize"%3A""%2C"SortOrder"%3A["IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT"]%2C"Facets"%3A[]%2C"Category"%3A"HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES"%2C"SearchPropertiesInResults"%3Atrue%2C"FacetsInResults"%3Atrue%2C"SaveRecent"%3Atrue%2C"TopN"%3A""%2C"SearchText"%3A"TDM 146"}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Dance on Camera: In Studio</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">

                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Course List                    </h1>
                </header>

								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-666191" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<span>This page was last updated on August 30, 2017. You should always consult the <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/">Harvard Course Catalog search page</a> for the latest course information.  All courses counting towards Theater, Dance &amp; Media course requirements appear on these pages.  You may also sort by <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/studiopractical-courses">Studio/Practical courses</a> and <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/theoretical-courses">Theoretical courses</a>.  Please note, courses are listed alphabetically and continue onto additional pages.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-862981" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRH%3A2018%20Spring%3ATerm%22%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22derek%20miller%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">American Plays and Musicals, 1940-1960</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

<article id="node-1011556" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">

    font-family: raleway;
    font-size: 100px;
    font-weight: 500;
    padding-bottom: 30px;
    padding-top: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}

    margin-top: 0px !important;
    padding-bottom: 40px;
}

    font-weight: 200;
    line-height: 38px;
    padding-left: 40px;
    padding-right: 40px;
}

    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 26px;
}

}

    width: 100%;
}

                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Course List                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-666191" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<span>This page was last updated on August 30, 2017. You should always consult the <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/">Harvard Course Catalog search page</a> for the latest course information.  All courses counting towards Theater, Dance &amp; Media course requirements appear on these pages.  You may also sort by <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/studiopractical-courses">Studio/Practical courses</a> and <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/theoretical-courses">Theoretical courses</a>.  Please note, courses are listed alphabetically and continue onto additional pages.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>

  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1441905122" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441905122"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441905122' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-1441905122-page' data-page='1' data-delta='1441905122' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-link sv-list-view-teaser sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><article id="node-704426" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2098%22}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Junior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 98 </strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/junior-tutorial" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Junior Tutorial</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-1026181" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22music%2030%20wolf%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Music, theater and dance of South Asia</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><strong>MUSIC 30</strong><br /><strong>Richard Wolf</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Wednesday, </strong>11:00am-11:59am<br /><strong>Location: </strong>Music PH6<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>18069  <strong>Course ID: </strong>204974 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/music-theater-and-dance-south-asia" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Music, theater and dance of South Asia</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-931886" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

          </header>

					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/academics" >ACADEMICS</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>

									<a name="main-content"></a>
                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Course List                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-666191" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<span>This page was last updated on August 30, 2017. You should always consult the <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/">Harvard Course Catalog search page</a> for the latest course information.  All courses counting towards Theater, Dance &amp; Media course requirements appear on these pages.  You may also sort by <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/studiopractical-courses">Studio/Practical courses</a> and <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/theoretical-courses">Theoretical courses</a>.  Please note, courses are listed alphabetically and continue onto additional pages.</span>
</p>
</div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
</div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1441905122" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441905122"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441905122' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-1441905122-page' data-page='2' data-delta='1441905122' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-link sv-list-view-teaser sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><article id="node-704526" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">

        </h1>
          </header>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">87c63a1d716528e7fddgoogle</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><script type="text/javascript">

      <header class="node-header">

<article id="node-706941" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20151%22}" rel="bookmark">Foundations of Design for the Theater</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 151 </strong><br /><strong>Sara Brown</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Meeting Time: TBD</strong><br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>10413  <strong>Course ID: </strong>109545 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/scenography-studio" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Foundations of Design for the Theater</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-704586" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20131%22}" rel="bookmark">Directing Lab</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Theater, Dance &amp; Media											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-1039691" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/psp/hrvihprd/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%2C%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Afalse%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22(%20COMPLIT%20173%20)%20(ACAD_CAREER%3A%5C%22FAS%5C%22)%22%2C%22DeepLink%22%3Afalse%7D" rel="bookmark">Carmen and the Art of Seduction</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>COMPLIT 173</strong><br /><strong>John T. Hamilton, Federico Cortese, Lisa Parkes</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Monday</strong>, 2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Friday</strong>, 1:00pm - 2:59pm<br /><strong>Location</strong>: TBD<br /><strong>Class Number</strong>:18557 <strong>Course ID</strong>:205135<br /><strong>Class Capacity</strong>: 20 <strong>Consent Required</strong>: Instructor <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/carmen-and-art-seduction" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Carmen and the Art of Seduction</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-1039656" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22slavic%20159%22%7D" rel="bookmark">Chekhov</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441904619" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1441904619"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter By</h2>

<article id="node-704501" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20114%22}" rel="bookmark">Foundations in Acting: Practical Aesthetics</a>
        </h1>
          </header>

													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Theater, Dance &amp; Media											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-704426" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2098%22}" rel="bookmark">Junior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 98 </strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/junior-tutorial" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Junior Tutorial</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-704416" class="node node-class node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/junior-tutorial" rel="bookmark">Junior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Fall</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_1_160647_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160647%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong>TDM 98</strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2015 Fall<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647<br /><strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>&#13;
<p><strong>Description: </strong>The junior tutorial is a unique opportunity for small groups of concentrators and a tutor to explore a creative or critical project.  The junior tutorial typically culminates in a longer project, which can be performance-based or critical/historical.</p>&#13;
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/junior-tutorial" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Junior Tutorial</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-704366" class="node node-class node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/classes/drama-theater-theory" rel="bookmark">Drama, Theater, Theory</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <section class="field field-name-field-semester field-type-list-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Semester:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Spring</div></div></section><section class="field field-name-field-offered-year field-type-datetime field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Offered:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">2015</span></div></div></section><div class="field field-name-field-class-link field-type-link-field field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><a href="https://coursecatalog.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do?keyword=CourseCatalog&amp;panel=icb.pagecontent695860%3Arsearch%3Ffq_coordinated_semester_yr%3D%26fq_school_nm%3D%26q%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2Basc%26start%3D0%26submit%3DSearch&amp;pageid=icb.page335057&amp;pageContentId=icb.pagecontent695860&amp;view=detail&amp;viewParam_q=id%3Ad_colgsas_2015_2_160648_001&amp;viewParam_returnUrl=search%3Fq%3D160648%26sort%3Dcourse_title%2520asc%26start%3D0%26rows%3D25#a_icb_pagecontent695860" >Course Website</a></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><strong></strong><strong>TDM 97</strong><br /><strong>Martin Puchner</strong><br />2016 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16403  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160648<br /><strong>Class Capacity: </strong>30 <strong>Consent Required: </strong>Instructor</p>
<p><strong>Description: </strong>This sophomore tutorial of the concentration in Theater, Dance, and Media, explores the theater as a medium that brings together all the other arts, from architecture and design to literature and music, through readings, discussions, and exercises. We also consider the intellectual traditions connected to theater, including philosophy, politics, and sociology. Key texts include Plato, Euripides, Brecht, and Churchill; sessions at the Harvard Theater Collection.</p>
<p><strong>Recommended Prep:</strong> Required of all, and limited to, concentrators.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-704361" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2097%22}" rel="bookmark">Drama, Theater, Theory</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

<article id="node-1011656" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/courses/theater-dance-media" >THEATER, DANCE &amp; MEDIA</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Theoretical											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-849286" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22german%20176%22}" rel="bookmark">[Staging War: Representations of Violence and Conflict in Drama and Theater]</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>GERMAN 176</strong><br /><strong>Michael Auer</strong><br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>15704  <strong>Course ID: </strong>114526 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/modern-drama" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about [Staging War: Representations of Violence and Conflict in Drama and Theater]</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-849271" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%2232v%22}" rel="bookmark">The Art of Storytelling</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>FRSEMR 32V</strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> TBA<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>11608  <strong>Course ID: </strong>122447 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/art-storytelling" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about The Art of Storytelling</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-849206" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2097%22}" rel="bookmark">Drama, Theater, Theory</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 97</strong><br /><strong>Derek Miller</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Monday, </strong>1:00pm-2:59pm<br /><strong>Class Number</strong>: 16403 <strong>Course ID</strong>: 160648 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/drama-theater-theory" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Drama, Theater, Theory</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>
    
    <p>
    </p></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>					  					  					  				 </div>
			  </div>
		  </header>
      <!--header regions end-->
		
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Can study abroad courses count for concentration?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-706896" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	Courses in theater, dance, and media offered at the Harvard Summer School may count for concentration credit with the approval of the Director of Undergraduate Studies (DUS). Courses approved for Harvard College study abroad credit by the <a href="http://oie.fas.harvard.edu/home">Office of International Education</a> will be considered for concentration credit in Theater, Dance &amp; Media with the approval of the DUS. Students should confer with the DUS before leaving for their study abroad and present course syllabi and relevant written work upon return. 
</p>
</div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/current-students" >Current Students</a><span>,</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/prospective-students" >Prospective Students</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1472152956" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1472152956"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter By</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1472152956' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-admissions"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/admissions"  class="" title="">Admissions <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-current-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/current-students"  class="" title="">Current Students <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-exploratory-pathways"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-distinctions/pathways-faq"  class="" title="">Exploratory Pathways <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-prospective-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/prospective-students"  class="" title="">Prospective Students <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->
        
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">
		<!-- Three column 3x33 Gpanel -->

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441904702' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<img height="137" width="475" alt="Footer logo" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-large" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_large/public/tdm/files/harvard_fas_theater_dance_media_signature_horizontal_large_rgb.png?m=1508253749&amp;itok=YxvP_pbe" title="" /></p>

  </div></div></div></div>				<div class="region region-footer-bottom"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1438974002" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_media no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1438974002"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>

<meta property="og:title" content="Do concentrators get preference in limited enrollment TDM classes?" />
<meta name="description" content="Not necessarily.  With the exception of concentration tutorials (TDM 97, 98, 99), which are required of all and limited to concentrators, it is up to each instructor to determine enrollment.  However, it is a good idea for students to let instructors know that they are concentrating in TDM.  Some classes, especially studio classes, are highly popular and therefore it is wise to consider several different options during shopping period." />
<meta property="og:description" content="Not necessarily.  With the exception of concentration tutorials (TDM 97, 98, 99), which are required of all and limited to concentrators, it is up to each instructor to determine enrollment.  However, it is a good idea for students to let instructors know that they are concentrating in TDM.  Some classes, especially studio classes, are highly popular and therefore it is wise to consider several different options during shopping period." />

	<div id="page-wrapper">

		
					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>
    
    <p>
    </p></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>					  					  					  				 </div>
			  </div>
		  </header>
      <!--header regions end-->
		
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Do concentrators get preference in limited enrollment TDM classes?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-706891" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Not necessarily.  With the exception of concentration tutorials (TDM 97, 98, 99), which are required of all and limited to concentrators, it is up to each instructor to determine enrollment.  However, it is a good idea for students to let instructors know that they are concentrating in TDM.  Some classes, especially studio classes, are highly popular and therefore it is wise to consider several different options during shopping period.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1472152956" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1472152956"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter By</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1472152956' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-admissions"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/admissions"  class="" title="">Admissions <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-current-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/current-students"  class="" title="">Current Students <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-exploratory-pathways"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-distinctions/pathways-faq"  class="" title="">Exploratory Pathways <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-prospective-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/prospective-students"  class="" title="">Prospective Students <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq" >FAQ</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												I am a theater-techie: how can I understand the field better and improve my skills?											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<article id="node-706881" class="node node-faq article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>No group is more sought after at Harvard than skilled theater/dance designers and technicians. There are multiple courses here that will hone your skills and lead you to understand the importance of stage craft and design.</p>
<ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><li><span>TDM 150 The Art of Scenography: 20th and 21st Century </span></li>
<li><span>TDM 151 Scenography Studio</span></li>
<li><span>TDM 191 Devising Physical and Image Performance</span></li>
<li><span>TDM 153 Light, Sound, Video Design</span></li>
<li><span>TDM 128X Death of a Salesman (or Two)</span></li>
<li><span>TDM 190 Making the Avant-Garde</span></li>
<li><span>TDM 105 Introduction to Dramaturgy</span></li>
<li><span>ENG 158A A History of Western Drama</span></li>
<li><span>AESTIN 58 Modern Art and Modernity</span></li>
</ul></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul><p></p></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-og-vocabulary field-type-entityreference field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">See also: <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-distinctions/pathways-faq" >Exploratory Pathways</a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

				
								  <!--sidebar second region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-second sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1472152956" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt"  module="boxes" delta="1472152956"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">Filter By</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1472152956' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-admissions"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/admissions"  class="" title="">Admissions <span class="count">(8)</span></a></li><li class="term-current-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/current-students"  class="" title="">Current Students <span class="count">(5)</span></a></li><li class="term-exploratory-pathways"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq-distinctions/pathways-faq"  class="" title="">Exploratory Pathways <span class="count">(7)</span></a></li><li class="term-prospective-students"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/faq/prospective-students"  class="" title="">Prospective Students <span class="count">(10)</span></a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar second region end-->

}
#header,
#menu-bar{
    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;
}

    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;
}

    font-family: raleway;

}

    margin: 10% 0 0 0;
    width: 100%;
}

    display: none;
}

}

    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 200;
    line-height: 38px;

    padding-right: 40px;
}

    font-family: raleway,sans-serif;

    line-height: 26px;
}

    border-top: 0 none !important;
}

    width: 100%;
}

			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">
			 <div id="header-container">
				 <div id="header-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display three-col clearfix">
					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>
    
    <p>
    </p></div></div></div>
  </div></div></div></div>					  					  					  				 </div>
