      <!--header regions end-->
		
		
    
		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">
			<div class="hg-container">
				<div id="content-column" role="main">
					<div class="content-inner">
					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>
						
													<section id="main-content">
								<a name="main-content"></a>
																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Frequently Asked Questions											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-faq view-id-os_faq view-display-id-page view-dom-id-c32f10d711964fb7e0bab4345a0c8a0e">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-1002496" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-concentrate-theater-dance-media" rel="bookmark">How do I concentrate in Theater, Dance &amp; Media?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	Students declare their concentrations in the fall of their sophomore year. There is no audition process to concentrate in TDM.
</p>

<p>
	For information on the application and admissions process, <a href="https://college.harvard.edu/admissions" target="_blank" title="">please contact Harvard College Admissions</a>.
</p>

<p>
	 
</p>

<p>
	Not sure where to start in Theater, Dance &amp; Media?  <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/how-do-i-concentrate-theater-dance-media" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about How do I concentrate in Theater, Dance &amp; Media?</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-706901" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/are-there-opportunities-do-musical-theater-concentration" rel="bookmark">Are there opportunities to do musical theater in the concentration?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	Absolutely! Many student productions are in musical theater, and the American Repertory Theater regularly stages musical theater productions (many of which go on to Broadway) offering students multiple opportunities for engagement. In addition, there are several courses each year in musical theater, including some offered by extraordinary visiting lecturers.&#13;
</p>&#13;
 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/are-there-opportunities-do-musical-theater-concentration" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Are there opportunities to do musical theater in the concentration?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-706896" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-study-abroad-courses-count-concentration" rel="bookmark">Can study abroad courses count for concentration?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	Courses in theater, dance, and media offered at the Harvard Summer School may count for concentration credit with the approval of the Director of Undergraduate Studies (DUS). Courses approved for Harvard College study abroad credit by the <a href="http://oie.fas.harvard.edu/home">Office of International Education</a> will be considered for concentration credit in Theater, Dance &amp; Media with the approval of the DUS. Students should confer with the DUS before leaving for their study abroad and present course syllabi and relevant written work upon return. </p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/can-study-abroad-courses-count-concentration" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Can study abroad courses count for concentration?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-706891" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-concentrators-get-preference-limited-enrollment-tdm-classes" rel="bookmark">Do concentrators get preference in limited enrollment TDM classes?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Not necessarily.  With the exception of concentration tutorials (TDM 97, 98, 99), which are required of all and limited to concentrators, it is up to each instructor to determine enrollment.  However, it is a good idea for students to let instructors know that they are concentrating in TDM.  Some classes, especially studio classes, are highly popular and therefore it is wise to consider several different options during shopping period.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-706886" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-freshman-seminars-count-toward-tdm-concentration-requirements" rel="bookmark">Do Freshman Seminars count toward TDM concentration requirements?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	Yes, concentrators may count one Freshman Seminar toward their degree requirements.&#13;
</p>&#13;
 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-freshman-seminars-count-toward-tdm-concentration-requirements" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Do Freshman Seminars count toward TDM concentration requirements?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-706881" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-tdm-concentrators-have-take-courses-all-areas-theater-dance-and-media-fulfill" rel="bookmark">I am a theater-techie: how can I understand the field better and improve my skills?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>No group is more sought after at Harvard than skilled theater/dance designers and technicians. There are multiple courses here that will hone your skills and lead you to understand the importance of stage craft and design.</p>&#13;
<ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 150 The Art of Scenography: 20th and 21st Century </span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 151 Scenography Studio</span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 191 Devising Physical and Image Performance</span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM</span></li></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/do-tdm-concentrators-have-take-courses-all-areas-theater-dance-and-media-fulfill" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about I am a theater-techie: how can I understand the field better and improve my skills?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-706876" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/it-possible-%E2%80%98double-major%E2%80%99-tdm-and-another-concentration" rel="bookmark">Wondering how your interest in media and technology might intersect with Theater, Dance &amp; Media?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Courses in VES, TDM, and Computer Science will offer you the opportunity to investigate this provocative intersection.</p>&#13;
<ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><li>VES 108 Stranger than Fiction</li>&#13;
<li>VES 137 New Waves</li>&#13;
<li>VES 164 Video, Performance, Narrative, Text, Actions</li>&#13;
<li>TDM 192 Total Theater: Devised Theater Workshop</li>&#13;
<li>TDM 191 Devising Physical and Image Performance</li>&#13;
<li>TDM 133 Directing Film: Telling the Story &amp; Working with Actors</li>&#13;
<li>TDM 128X Death of a Salesman (or Two)</li>&#13;
<li>COMPSCI 1 Great Ideas in Computer Science</li>&#13;
<li>COMPSCI</li></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/it-possible-%E2%80%98double-major%E2%80%99-tdm-and-another-concentration" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Wondering how your interest in media and technology might intersect with Theater, Dance &amp; Media?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-706871" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/when-common-casting-and-there-info-session" rel="bookmark">Interested in the intersection of history, theater, and music? </a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>What did Lin-Manuel Miranda study anyway?  Why not take a course on the history of modern drama, and then explore American musicals, or a course on Hiphop or African American theater.</p>&#13;
<ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><li><span style="font-size: initial;">ENG 158A A History of Modern Drama </span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">AI 31 American Musicals and American Culture </span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">FS 34V Broadway Musicals </span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">AAAS 142 Hiphop and Don’t Stop</span></li>&#13;
<li></li></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/when-common-casting-and-there-info-session" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Interested in the intersection of history, theater, and music? </span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-706866" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-common-casting" rel="bookmark">Never taken a dance course and intimidated by the prospect of being in the studio with a bunch of ballerinas? </a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>There are a number of dance/movement classes, both credit and non-credit, in which non-dancers are encouraged to participate, to add their perspective, to gain experience about the awesome instrument we all have the privilege of occupying from birth to death.  </p>&#13;
<ul><ul><ul><ul><ul><li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 141 Movement Lab</span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">Music 105r Fundamentals of Improvisation and Composition</span></li>&#13;
<li><span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 144 Embodied Expression/Expressive Body: Dance in Cultural Contexts</span></li></ul></ul></ul></ul></ul><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/what-common-casting" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Never taken a dance course and intimidated by the prospect of being in the studio with a bunch of ballerinas? </span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-10 views-row-even views-row-last">
    <article id="node-706861" class="node node-faq node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="toggle node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/it-possible-students-who-do-not-concentrate-tdm-participate-all-levels-concentration" rel="bookmark">Are you a trained dancer wondering how your experience fits in with TDM?</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="os-slider node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>&#13;
	Consider enrolling in a dance composition course, or a course on Avant-Garde Theater, in which dance has played a significant role, or take on course on dance in cultural context, a beginning acting course, or experiment with devised theater.&#13;
</p>&#13;
&#13;
<ul style="margin-left: 40px;"><li>&#13;
		<span style="font-size: initial;">Music 12A Harvard Dance Project</span>&#13;
	</li>&#13;
	<li>&#13;
		<span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 192 Total Theater: Devised Theater Workshop</span>&#13;
	</li>&#13;
	<li>&#13;
		<span style="font-size: initial;">TDM 110 Beginning Acting</span>&#13;
	</li>&#13;
	<li></li></ul><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/faq/it-possible-students-who-do-not-concentrate-tdm-participate-all-levels-concentration" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Are you a trained dancer wondering how your experience fits in with TDM?</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>

#boxes-box-1438973447 {
padding-right:25px;
padding-left:25px;
}
}
@media (max-width: 768px){

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

}

    font-size: 25px;
}

}

}

      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">

      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://portal.my.harvard.edu/psp/hrvihprd/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22%28%20Opera%20%29%20%28ACAD_CAREER%3A\%22FAS\%22%29%22}" rel="bookmark">Opera</a>

    <article id="node-895696" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22french%2080%22%2C%22DeepLink%22%3Afalse}" rel="bookmark">French Theater Across Time: An Introduction to Performance</a>
        </h1>
          </header>

  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-875276" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22gaga%22%7D" rel="bookmark">GAGA People: Movement Language </a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 143</strong><br /><strong>Mario Zambrano</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Monday/Wednesday, </strong>9:15am-10:44am<br /><strong>Location</strong>: Harvard Dance Center, 66 Garden St.<br /><strong>Class Number:</strong>33894   <strong>Course ID:</strong>204031 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/gagapeople-movement-methodology-created-ohad-naharin" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about GAGA People: Movement Language </span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-862981" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRH%3A2018%20Spring%3ATerm%22%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22derek%20miller%22%7D" rel="bookmark">American Plays and Musicals, 1940-1960</a>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20173x%22%7D" rel="bookmark">Acting and Authenticity</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 173X</strong><br /><strong>David Levine</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Farkas Hall 203<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>17015  <strong>Course ID: </strong>156461 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-and-authenticity" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting and Authenticity</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  <div class="views-row views-row-11 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-722941" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://ves.fas.harvard.edu/" rel="bookmark">Harvard University Department of Visual and Environmental Studies</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Department of Visual and Environmental Studies (VES) is the curricular home of a broad range of studio arts and theoretical studies.</p>&#13;
<p>The department offers studio courses in areas that include painting, drawing, sculpture, printmaking, design, film, video, animation, and photography.</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/department-visual-and-environmental-studies" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard University Department of Visual and Environmental Studies</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-12 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-722936" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.music.fas.harvard.edu/" rel="bookmark">Harvard University Department of Music</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Harvard University Department of Music is devoted to the study and practice of music, and exists to provide a first-rate musical education that gives students advanced skills in music as well as knowledge of music history and repertory. <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/harvard-university-department-music" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard University Department of Music</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-13 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-721081" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://artsgarden.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do" rel="bookmark">Arts @ 29 Garden</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>Harvard’s Arts @ 29 Garden is a new space intended to support and enable creativity, collaboration, experimentation and art-making amongst faculty, students and visiting artists.</span></p>&#13;
<p><span>Arts @ 29 Garden will influence and be influenced by art-making across the campus and</span></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/arts-29-garden" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Arts @ 29 Garden</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-14 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-715096" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://ofa.fas.harvard.edu/harvard-dance-center" rel="bookmark">Harvard Dance Center</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Harvard Dance Center opened in the Fall of 2005 and is one of the primary performance venues for dance at Harvard. The Center houses the Dance Office and features two studios and performance amenities for students and visiting artists.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-15 views-row-odd views-row-last">

      <header class="node-header">

    <article id="node-704521" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">

background-color:#ccc!important;
}
#menu-bar #block-os-primary-menu {
    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;
}
#menu-bar #block-os-primary-menu a {
    color: #000;
}
#menu-bar #block-os-primary-menu li {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #fff !important;
}
.link-count-mobi-main a {
    background-color: #000;
}
#boxes-box-site_info {
    min-height: 80px;
    width: 100%;
}
#boxes-box-1438973447 img {
    min-height: inherit;
}
#layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy,
.block-boxes-os_slideshow_box{
background-color:#444!important;
}
.front #layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy h2{
font-size:80px!important;
}

padding-left:25px;
padding-right:10px;
}

width:100%;
}

padding-right:25px;
padding-left:25px;
}
}

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Links											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-links view-id-os_links view-display-id-page view-dom-id-a95d9cbf324aca984abd40eaf828dd46">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first">
    <article id="node-704456" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2099%22}" rel="bookmark">Senior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 99A</strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br /><span>2017 Fall</span><br /><strong>Class Number: </strong><span>17008  </span><strong>Course ID: </strong><span>160704</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/senior-tutorial" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Senior Tutorial</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-2 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-704426" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2098%22}" rel="bookmark">Junior Tutorial</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 98 </strong><br /><strong>Deborah Foster</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16766  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160647 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/junior-tutorial" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Junior Tutorial</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-3 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-704361" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRJ%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%2097%22}" rel="bookmark">Drama, Theater, Theory</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 97</strong><br /><strong>Derek Miller</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Monday, </strong>1:00pm-2:59pm<br /><strong>Class Number</strong>: 16403 <strong>Course ID</strong>: 160648 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/drama-theater-theory" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Drama, Theater, Theory</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-4 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-666311" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hastypudding.org/" rel="bookmark">Hasty Pudding Theatricals</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The Hasty Pudding Theatricals is the third oldest theater organization in the world, preceded only by the Comédie-Française and the Oberammergau Passion Players. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-5 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-666306" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hrgsp.org/" rel="bookmark">Harvard-Radcliffe Gilbert and Sullivan Players </a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The Harvard-Radcliffe Gilbert and Sullivan Players are an independent, nonprofit student theater group, dedicated to performing comic operas. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-6 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-666301" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.americanrepertorytheater.org/" rel="bookmark">American Repertory Theater</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The A.R.T. at Harvard University is a leading force in the American theater, producing groundbreaking work in Cambridge and beyond. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-7 views-row-odd">
    <article id="node-666291" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hrdctheater.com/" rel="bookmark">Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>Founded in 1908 as the Harvard Dramatic Club, the Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club is an umbrella organization for campus theater at Harvard College. The HRDC directly oversees two student productions on the Loeb Mainstage each semester, including the annual Fall Visiting Director’s Project</span></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/harvard-radcliffe-dramatic-club" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-8 views-row-even">
    <article id="node-666286" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://ofa.fas.harvard.edu/" rel="bookmark">Office for the Arts</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The Office for the Arts at Harvard (OFA) supports student engagement in the arts and integrates the arts into University life. Through its programs and services, the OFA teaches and mentors, fosters student art making, connects students to accomplished artists, commissions new work, and</span></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/office-arts" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Office for the Arts</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
  <div class="views-row views-row-9 views-row-odd views-row-last">
    <article id="node-666271" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://guides.hcl.harvard.edu/htc" rel="bookmark">Harvard Theatre Collection</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>Formed in 1901, the Harvard Theatre Collection is the oldest collection of its kind in America and one of the largest in the world. A department of </span><a href="http://hcl.harvard.edu/libraries/houghton/">Houghton Li</a></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/guide-harvard-theater-collection" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard Theatre Collection</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
  </div>
    </div>
  
      <div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-previous"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links?page=3">‹‹</a></li><li class="pager-current">5 of 5</li><li class="pager-next">&nbsp;</li></ul></div>  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->

  };

    wf.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https' : 'http') +

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

		<div id="columns" class="clearfix">

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{

}

    margin-top: 80px;
}

}

    padding-left: 0;
}

margin-bottom:0;
}

font-weight:bold;
}
.node-type-page .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb a {
    font-weight: normal;
}
.block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt.navigation ul {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;
    border-right: 1px solid #fff;
}
.view-id-os_profiles.view-display-id-page article h1 {
    margin-bottom: 0;

					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">87c63a1d716528e7fddgoogle</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><script type="text/javascript">
  WebFontConfig = {
    google: { families: [ 'Raleway:400,100,200,300,500,600,700,800,900:latin' ] }
  };
  (function() {
    var wf = document.createElement('script');
    wf.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https' : 'http') +
      '://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/webfont/1/webfont.js';
    wf.type = 'text/javascript';
    wf.async = 'true';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(wf, s);
  })(); </script></div></div></div>  </div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{
top:15px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #columns {
    margin-top: 80px;
}
.os-image-caption{
line-height:22px;
}
.page-news #main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 0;
}
.page-news .node-title{
margin-bottom:0;
}
#boxes-box-1441905122 h1 a{
font-weight:bold;
}
.node-type-page .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb a {
    font-weight: normal;
}
.block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt.navigation ul {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;

					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">87c63a1d716528e7fddgoogle</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><script type="text/javascript">
  WebFontConfig = {
    google: { families: [ 'Raleway:400,100,200,300,500,600,700,800,900:latin' ] }
  };
  (function() {
    var wf = document.createElement('script');
    wf.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https' : 'http') +
      '://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/webfont/1/webfont.js';
    wf.type = 'text/javascript';
    wf.async = 'true';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(wf, s);
  })(); </script></div></div></div>  </div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{

}

    margin-top: 80px;
}

}

    padding-left: 0;
}

margin-bottom:0;
}

font-weight:bold;
}
.node-type-page .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb a {
    font-weight: normal;
}
.block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt.navigation ul {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;
    border-right: 1px solid #fff;
}
.view-id-os_profiles.view-display-id-page article h1 {
    margin-bottom: 0;

					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">

																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Director of Undergraduate Studies											</h1>

																	<div id="content">

      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <article id="node-698676" class="node node-person article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

    <div class="node-content">
      <h1  class="node-title" rel="nofollow"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/deborah-d-foster">Deborah D. Foster</a></h1><div class="field field-name-field-professional-title field-type-text field-label-hidden view-mode-sidebar_teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Director of Undergraduate Studies (DUS) for Theater, Dance &amp; Media</div><div class="field-item odd">Senior Lecturer on Theater, Dance &amp; Media</div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      
      </article>

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441903988" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt navigation"  module="boxes" delta="1441903988"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="active" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>

      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="active" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->

    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;
}
#menu-bar #block-os-primary-menu a {
    color: #000;
}
#menu-bar #block-os-primary-menu li {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #fff !important;
}
.link-count-mobi-main a {
    background-color: #000;
}
#boxes-box-site_info {
    min-height: 80px;
    width: 100%;
}
#boxes-box-1438973447 img {
    min-height: inherit;
}
#layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy,
.block-boxes-os_slideshow_box{
background-color:#444!important;
}
.front #layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy h2{
font-size:80px!important;
}

padding-left:25px;

}

width:100%;
}

padding-right:25px;
padding-left:25px;
}
}

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

																									<header id="main-content-header">
																					<h1 id="page-title">
												Past Visiting Faculty											</h1>
																													</header>
																
																	<div id="content">
										<div class="view view-os-profiles view-id-os_profiles view-display-id-page view-dom-id-35c8eef077e2a45dd92bc3fbc59aeaed">
        
  
  
      <div class="view-content">
        <div class="views-row views-row-1 views-row-odd views-row-first views-row-last">
    <article id="node-739711" class="node node-person article with-person-photo modified-in-os_profiles_process_node clearfix" role="article">

      <div class="field field-name-field-person-photo field-type-imagefield-crop field-label-hidden view-mode-sidebar_teaser">
    <div class="field-items">
            <div class="field-item even">
      <figure>
        <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/leslie-woodies" ><img class="image-style-profile-thumbnail" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/profile_thumbnail/public/tdm/files/va_leslie_woodies.jpg?m=1450801715&amp;itok=ZF2N3fY1" width="75" height="75" alt="Leslie Woodies" title="Leslie Woodies" /></a>              </figure>
      </div>
        </div>
</div>  
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <h1  class="node-title" rel="nofollow"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/leslie-woodies">Leslie Woodies</a></h1>    </div>
  
      
      
      </article>
  </div>
    </div>

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441903988" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt navigation"  module="boxes" delta="1441903988"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="active" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>

		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">
		<!-- Three column 3x33 Gpanel -->
		
			<div class="at-panel gpanel panel-display footer clearfix">
								<div class="region region-footer-first"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1441904702" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441904702"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441904702' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>
	<img height="137" width="475" alt="Footer logo" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-large" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_large/public/tdm/files/harvard_fas_theater_dance_media_signature_horizontal_large_rgb.png?m=1508253991&amp;itok=YxvP_pbe" title="" /></p>

	Theater, Dance &amp; Media<br />Farkas Hall<br />10-12 Holyoke Street<br />Cambridge, MA 02138<br />617-496-2796<br /><a href="mailto:tdm@fas.harvard.edu">tdm@fas.harvard.edu</a>

  </div></div></div></div>								<div class="region region-footer-third"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1441910396" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441910396"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441903988" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt navigation"  module="boxes" delta="1441903988"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="active" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="active" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">

			<div class="at-panel gpanel panel-display footer clearfix">
								<div class="region region-footer-first"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-1441904702" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1441904702"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441904702' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>

      <div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-previous"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people?page=1">‹‹</a></li><li class="pager-current">3 of 6</li><li class="pager-next"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people?page=3">››</a></li></ul></div>  
  
  
  
  
</div>									</div>
								
							</section><!--main content ends-->
											</div>
				</div>

								  <!--sidebar first region beg-->
				  <div class="region region-sidebar-first sidebar"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><section id="block-boxes-1441903988" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt navigation"  module="boxes" delta="1441903988"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T. Faculty</a></li><li class="term-affiliated-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/affiliated-faculty"  class="" title="">Affiliated Faculty</a></li><li class="term-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/visiting-faculty"  class="" title="">Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-faculty"  class="active" title="Historical list of past visiting lectureships in Theater, Dance &amp;amp; Media at Harvard">Past Visiting Faculty</a></li><li class="term-past-visiting-artists"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/past-visiting-artists"  class="" title="">Past Visiting Artists</a></li><li class="term-staff--administrators"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/staff-administrators"  class="" title="">Staff & Administrators</a></li></ul></div></div></div></div>
  </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->
        
				
			</div>
		</div>
		<!--footer region beg-->
		<footer id="footer" class="clearfix" role="contentinfo">

      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T.   </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

      <h2 class="block-title">View people by affiliation</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1441903988' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div class="item-list"><ul><li class="term-chair"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/chair"  class="" title="">Chair</a></li><li class="term-director-of-undergraduate-studies"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/director-undergraduate-studies"  class="" title="">Director of Undergraduate Studies</a></li><li class="term-standing-committee-on-theater-dance--media"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/standing-committee"  class="" title="">Standing Committee on Theater, Dance & Media</a></li><li class="term-art-faculty"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/people/people/art-faculty"  class="" title="">A.R.T.   </div></section><section id="block-boxes-1442344177" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_html"  module="boxes" delta="1442344177"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
      <h2 class="block-title">About our People</h2>
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1442344177' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><p>Our <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/people">people</a> are representative of the diverse and interdisciplinary fields of scholarship and practice, making Theater, Dance &amp; Media a highly collaborative and innovative concentration.  </p></div></div></div>
  </div></section></div></div>				  <!--sidebar first region end-->

    font-family: raleway;
    font-size: 18px;
}
#header,
#menu-bar{
    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;
}
.front #layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy {
    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 transparent;
}

    font-family: raleway;
font-weight:500;
}

    margin: 10% 0 0 0;
    width: 100%;
}

    display: none;
}

    padding-top: 30px;
    text-align: center;
}

}

    line-height: 38px;

    padding-right: 40px;
}

}

}

    width: 100%;
}

																					<h1 id="page-title">

																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-1039146" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2018</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Jan</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">29</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">4:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Sanders Theatre, 45 Quincy Street, Cambridge</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/norton-lectures-frederick-wiseman" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Norton Lectures: Frederick Wiseman</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>

  </article>

      <div class="event-start">

      <span class="event-start-day">20</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/tdm-production-owl-answers-4" rel="bookmark" title="">TDM Production: The Owl Answers (with Post-Show Talkback)</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">7:30pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street, Cambridge</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

  </article>
<article id="node-1038726" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2017</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Oct</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">21</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/tdm-production-owl-answers-3" rel="bookmark" title="">TDM Production: The Owl Answers (with Post-Show Talkback)</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">7:30pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street, Cambridge</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/tdm-production-owl-answers-3" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about TDM Production: The Owl Answers (with Post-Show Talkback)</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-1038721" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2017</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Oct</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">19</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/tdm-production-owl-answers-2" rel="bookmark" title="">TDM Production: The Owl Answers</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;

<article id="node-982726" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2017</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Apr</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">08</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">

          </h1>
              </header>

<article id="node-971971" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2017</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Mar</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">07</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/master-class-series-okwui-okpokwasili" rel="bookmark" title="">OFA Dance Program Master Class Series: Okwui Okpokwasili </a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">

					  					  <div class="region region-header-second"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-boxes-site-info" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_site_info no-title"  module="boxes" delta="site_info"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

<article id="node-934581" class="node node-page node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/fear-failure-project" rel="bookmark">Fear of Failure Project</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Created by students in TDM 181 The Artist Citizen: Socially Engaged Art in the 21st Century, the mission of this piece is to awaken a mindfulness in ourselves and our community of what it means to fail.  At a university that is an international beacon of success, there is a culture here, a mindset here, that facilitates the sense of always needing to succeed and strive for more and never accepting or acknowledging our failures.  We hope that this piece will create a space that will invite people to reflect on their own failures and interact with the failures of others,</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/fear-failure-project" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Fear of Failure Project</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
