<article id="node-924131" class="node node-news node-teaser article modified-in-os_news_process_node clearfix" role="article">
  <div class="field field-name-field-photo field-type-image field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><figure class="clearfix field-item even"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/curtain-rises-new-theater-dance-media-magazine" ><img class="image-style-os-square-100-100" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_square_100_100/public/tdm/files/harvard_crimson_press_178x138.png?m=1508254480&amp;itok=dAytQm3y" width="100" height="100" alt="Curtain Rises on New Theater Dance Media Magazine" title="Curtain Rises on New Theater Dance Media Magazine" /></a></figure></div></div>
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/curtain-rises-new-theater-dance-media-magazine" rel="bookmark">Curtain Rises on New Theater Dance Media Magazine</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-news-date field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">October 21, 2016</span></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-924121" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Nov</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">14</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/perspectives-performance-claire-bishop" rel="bookmark" title="">Perspectives on Performance with Claire Bishop</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">6:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Art Museums; Menschel Hall</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/perspectives-performance-claire-bishop" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Perspectives on Performance with Claire Bishop</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>

  </article>

<article id="node-913366" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Nov</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">12</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">

          </h1>

    padding: 0 15px;
    text-decoration: none !important;
    text-transform: uppercase;
}

												On campus at Harvard											</h1>

																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-895111" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Sep</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">30</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/training-module-session-6" rel="bookmark" title="">Training Module Session 6</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="register-event-full">Registration Closed</span><span class="date-display-single">1:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Module 6: 1pm-3pm: <strong>Costume Design</strong></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-registration field-type-registration field-label-above view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Registration:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></section>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-895101" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Sep</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">30</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/training-module-session-5" rel="bookmark" title="">Training Module Session 5</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="register-event-full">Registration Closed</span><span class="date-display-single">10:00am</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Module 5: 10am-12pm: <strong>Producing</strong></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-registration field-type-registration field-label-above view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Registration:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"></div></div></section>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-895096" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Sep</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">23</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/training-module-session-4" rel="bookmark" title="">Training Module Session 4</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">

<article id="node-862776" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Sep</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">02</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/auditions-dream-play-0" rel="bookmark" title="">Auditions: A Dream Play</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">6:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Audition for Theater, Dance &amp; Media’s <strong><em>A DREAM PLAY, </em></strong>by August Strindberg</p>&#13;
<p>This fall, <a href="http://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/">Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a> (TDM) will present Strindberg’s <strong><em>A DREAM PLAY</em></strong>, adapted and directed by Daniel Kramer, at Farkas Hall. Daniel is a Visiting Professor in TDM and an award winning theater, opera and dance director based London where he is Artistic Director of <a href="https://www.eno.org/">English National Opera</a>. In Kramer's pared down, physically</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/auditions-dream-play-0" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Auditions: A Dream Play</span></a></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>

    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">6:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Audition for Theater, Dance &amp; Media’s <strong><em>A DREAM PLAY, </em></strong>by August Strindberg</p>&#13;

Daniel is a Visiting Professor in TDM and an award winning theater, opera and dance director based London where he is Artistic Director of <a href="https://www.eno.org/">English National Opera</a>. <article id="node-835211" class="node node-news node-teaser article modified-in-os_news_process_node clearfix" role="article">
  <div class="field field-name-field-photo field-type-image field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><figure class="clearfix field-item even"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/arts-review" ><img class="image-style-os-square-100-100" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_square_100_100/public/tdm/files/gazette_2.jpg?m=1508254497&amp;itok=jJBNP3wh" width="100" height="100" alt="The Arts in Review" title="The Arts in Review" /></a></figure></div></div>
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/arts-review" rel="bookmark">The Arts in Review</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-news-date field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">May 23, 2016</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h3>It was a year of creativity, performance, and history making</h3></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-815466" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Apr</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">25</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/love-struggle-musical-presentation-philosophical-workshop" rel="bookmark" title="">LOVE THE STRUGGLE - A MUSICAL PRESENTATION &amp; PHILOSOPHICAL WORKSHOP</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single"> <span class="date-display-start">7:30pm</span> to <span class="date-display-end">9:30pm</span> </span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Lowell House, JCR</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><em>Love The Struggle</em> is a new pop noir musical by Yair Evnine (cellist on <em>Waitress</em>) and Stacy Kray, inspired by the lives, loves and writings of Jean-Paul Sartre and Simone de Beauvoir. This workshop presents musical excerpts directed by A.R.T. student dramaturg Amanda Faye Martin<strong> </strong>and starring Harvard students KeeHup Yong, Asia Stewart, Laura Sky Herman and Lindsey Ruggles. The performance will be followed by discussion about existentialist thought, music, freedom &amp; modern love with: Nancy Bauer (Philosophy Professor at Tufts University)</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/love-struggle-musical-presentation-philosophical-workshop" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about LOVE THE STRUGGLE - A MUSICAL PRESENTATION &amp; PHILOSOPHICAL WORKSHOP</span></a></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
</div><h2 class="element-invisible">Pages</h2><div class="item-list"><ul class="pager"><li class="pager-first"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard">first</a></li><li class="pager-previous"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=5">«</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 1" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard">1</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 2" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=1">2</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 3" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=2">3</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 4" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=3">4</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 5" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=4">5</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 6" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=5">6</a></li><li class="pager-current">7</li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 8" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=7">8</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 9" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=8">9</a></li><li class="pager-item"><a title="Go to page 10" href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=9">10</a></li><li class="pager-next"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=7">»</a></li><li class="pager-last"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/resources/campus-harvard?page=9">last</a></li></ul></div>									</div>

<article id="node-807141" class="node node-page node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/hear-word" rel="bookmark">HEAR WORD!</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><img height="522" width="980" alt="Hear Word" title="Hear Word" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-xxlarge" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_xxlarge/public/tdm/files/hear_word-207_copy1.jpg?m=1499929504&amp;itok=XEXrNyVw" /></p>&#13;
<p>The <a href="http://africa.harvard.edu/" data-url="http://africa.harvard.edu/">the Center for African Studies</a> in association with <a href="http://americanrepertorytheater.org/" data-url="http://americanrepertorytheater.org/">American Repertory Theater</a>, </p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/hear-word" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about HEAR WORD!</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>

<article id="node-784916" class="node node-page node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/man-who" rel="bookmark">__________________________</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><a href="https://www.boxoffice.harvard.edu/Online/default.asp" data-url="https://www.boxoffice.harvard.edu/Online/default.asp"><img height="1000" width="647" class="media-element file-default file-os-files-xxlarge" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_files_xxlarge/public/tdm/files/tdmposter.jpg?m=1499960413&amp;itok=YbIbXkKU" alt="" title="" /></a><br /><br /></p>&#13;
<p><span style="font-family: 'andale mono', times; font-size: small;">    Students: $5; General Admission: $10</span></p>&#13;

  </article>

    min-height: 60px;
    width:90%;
}
#boxes-box-site_info h1 {
    font-size: 25px;
}
#boxes-box-1438974105 p {
    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: 200;
    line-height: 28px;
    padding-left: 20px;
    padding-right: 20px;
}
#block-boxes-1438974105 {
    margin-top: 0px !important;
}
#block-boxes-1438973447 {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-top: 1px solid #fff !important;
}
.front .node-event .node-header {
    margin: -70px 0 10px 125px!important;
}
.not-front .node-event .node-content, .not-front .node-event {
    padding-left: 0px!important;
}
.node-event .node-content, .node-event .clearfix {
    margin-left: 70px !important;
}

.front #box-os_news_latest-page .node-content{
padding-left:55px;
}
#box-os_events_upcoming-page .node-content {
    padding-left: 0px !important;
}
#main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 70px;
}
}
</style></div></div></div>  </div>

  
</div>
</div></div></div>

																	<div id="content">
										<div  class="os-taxonomy-term depth-0"><div class="term-listing-heading"></div><article id="node-783916" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Apr</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">01</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/man-who" rel="bookmark" title="">The Man Who</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">8:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Farkas Hall, 10-12 Holyoke Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/tdm/www.boxoffice.harvard.edu"> </a><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/man-who" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about The Man Who</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-781926" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Feb</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">25</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/exist" rel="bookmark" title="">EXIST</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-start">Sat</span> - <span class="date-display-end">Mon</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">Feb 25</span> to <span class="date-display-end">Feb 27</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">7:00pm</span> - <span class="date-display-end">7:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Loeb Experimental Theater</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>Directed by Elizabeth O’Donnell ’17<br />Produced by Reva Nohria ’17</p>&#13;
<p>“Wherever you go, there you are.” – John Kabat-Zinn</p>&#13;
<p>Experience a meditation retreat in the Ex. Increase your awareness and gain insight through mindfulness practice while letting go of the external pressures in your life. Relax into the moment and explore what is happening with you. All are welcome to embark on this journey of self realization and self compassion. And if your mind begins to wander, as it will… Relax, Exhale, Exist.</p>&#13;
<p>To reserve a spot, please email </p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/exist" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about EXIST</span></a></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-748001" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Apr</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">15</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/harvard-cabaret-0" rel="bookmark" title="">HEAR WORD!</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">7:30pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Dance Center, 60 Garden Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/harvard-cabaret-0" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about HEAR WORD!</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-738306" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Jan</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">03</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/new-works-lab-application-deadline" rel="bookmark" title="">Harvard Art Development Festival; Application Deadline</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">11:55pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Dance Center, 60 Garden Street</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The new Theater, Dance, and Media-sponsored festival will be a lab for the development of new artistic works.</p>
<p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/new-works-lab-application-deadline" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard Art Development Festival; Application Deadline</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-735981" class="node node-news node-teaser article modified-in-os_news_process_node clearfix" role="article">
  <div class="field field-name-field-photo field-type-image field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><figure class="clearfix field-item even"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/life-cabaret" ><img class="image-style-os-square-100-100" src="//static.hwpi.harvard.edu/files/styles/os_square_100_100/public/tdm/files/111715_cabaret_084_605thumbnail.jpg?m=1448292419&amp;itok=J8_7F1hU" width="100" height="100" alt="Life in a Cabaret" title="Life in a Cabaret" /></a></figure></div></div>
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/news/life-cabaret" rel="bookmark">Life in a Cabaret</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-field-news-date field-type-datestamp field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-single">November 18, 2015</span></div></div></div><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><h3>Harvard College and A.R.T. Institute students present musical standards, new works designed to undercut stress in the first ever Harvard Cabaret.</h3></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-735096" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2016</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Jan</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">15</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/wintersession-2016-arts-29-garden-january-arts-intensives" rel="bookmark" title="">Wintersession 2016: Arts @ 29 Garden January Arts Intensives</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-start">Sun</span> - <span class="date-display-end">Sun</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">Jan 15</span> to <span class="date-display-end">Jan 22</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">5:00pm</span> - <span class="date-display-end">5:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Arts @ 29 Garden</div></div></section><div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p style="text-align:left" align="center"></p>
<p style="text-align:left" align="center">Come explore architecture, theater or public art.</p>
<p style="text-align:left" align="center"> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/wintersession-2016-arts-29-garden-january-arts-intensives" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Wintersession 2016: Arts @ 29 Garden January Arts Intensives</span></a></p></div></div></div>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-730096" class="node node-event node-teaser article event-start clearfix" role="article">
  
      <div class="event-start">
      <span class="event-year">2015</span>
      <span class="event-start-month">Nov</span>
      <span class="event-start-day">11</span>
    </div>
  
  <div class="event-content">
          <header class="node-header">
                  <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
            <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/event/gym-dances" rel="bookmark" title="">GYM DANCES</a>
          </h1>
              </header>
      
      
    <div class="node-content">
      <div class="field field-name-field-date field-type-datetime field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><span class="date-display-start">Sat</span> - <span class="date-display-end">Wed</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">Nov 11</span> to <span class="date-display-end">Nov 15</span>,  <span class="date-display-start">8:00pm</span> - <span class="date-display-end">3:00pm</span><p></p></div></div></div><section class="field field-name-field-event-location field-type-text field-label-inline clearfix view-mode-teaser"><h2 class="field-label">Location:&nbsp;</h2><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even">Harvard Dance Center, 60 Garden Street</div></div></section>    </div>
  
      
      </div>
  
  </article>
<article id="node-722941" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://ves.fas.harvard.edu/" rel="bookmark">Harvard University Department of Visual and Environmental Studies</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Department of Visual and Environmental Studies (VES) is the curricular home of a broad range of studio arts and theoretical studies.</p>&#13;
<p>The department offers studio courses in areas that include painting, drawing, sculpture, printmaking, design, film, video, animation, and photography.</p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/department-visual-and-environmental-studies" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard University Department of Visual and Environmental Studies</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-722936" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.music.fas.harvard.edu/" rel="bookmark">Harvard University Department of Music</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Harvard University Department of Music is devoted to the study and practice of music, and exists to provide a first-rate musical education that gives students advanced skills in music as well as knowledge of music history and repertory. <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/harvard-university-department-music" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard University Department of Music</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-721081" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://artsgarden.harvard.edu/icb/icb.do" rel="bookmark">Arts @ 29 Garden</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>Harvard’s Arts @ 29 Garden is a new space intended to support and enable creativity, collaboration, experimentation and art-making amongst faculty, students and visiting artists.</span></p>&#13;
<p><span>Arts @ 29 Garden will influence and be influenced by art-making across the campus and</span></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/arts-29-garden" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Arts @ 29 Garden</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-715096" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://ofa.fas.harvard.edu/harvard-dance-center" rel="bookmark">Harvard Dance Center</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>The Harvard Dance Center opened in the Fall of 2005 and is one of the primary performance venues for dance at Harvard. The Center houses the Dance Office and features two studios and performance amenities for students and visiting artists.</p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-666311" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hastypudding.org/" rel="bookmark">Hasty Pudding Theatricals</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The Hasty Pudding Theatricals is the third oldest theater organization in the world, preceded only by the Comédie-Française and the Oberammergau Passion Players. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-666306" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hrgsp.org/" rel="bookmark">Harvard-Radcliffe Gilbert and Sullivan Players </a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The Harvard-Radcliffe Gilbert and Sullivan Players are an independent, nonprofit student theater group, dedicated to performing comic operas. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-666301" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.americanrepertorytheater.org/" rel="bookmark">American Repertory Theater</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>The A.R.T. at Harvard University is a leading force in the American theater, producing groundbreaking work in Cambridge and beyond. </span></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-666291" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="http://www.hrdctheater.com/" rel="bookmark">Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p><span>Founded in 1908 as the Harvard Dramatic Club, the Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club is an umbrella organization for campus theater at Harvard College. The HRDC directly oversees two student productions on the Loeb Mainstage each semester, including the annual Fall Visiting Director’s Project</span></p> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/harvard-radcliffe-dramatic-club" class="node-readmore">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Harvard-Radcliffe Dramatic Club</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {

    margin-top: 20px!important;
}

    border-right: 1px solid #fff;
}

    font-size: 20px !important;

}

font-weight:bold;
}
h1#page-title, h1.node-title, .page-search .title a, .boxes-box-content h2 {
    line-height: normal!important;
}

    border-top: 3px solid #666;
    font-weight: normal !important;
    padding-bottom: 10px;

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-site_info' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><h1><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >Theater, Dance &amp; Media</a></h1>

    min-height: 60px;
    width:90%;
}

    font-size: 25px;

    padding-right: 20px;

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">87c63a1d716528e7fddgoogle</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><script type="text/javascript">
  WebFontConfig = {
    google: { families: [ 'Raleway:400,100,200,300,500,600,700,800,900:latin' ] }
  };
  (function() {
    var wf = document.createElement('script');
    wf.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https' : 'http') +
      '://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/webfont/1/webfont.js';
    wf.type = 'text/javascript';
    wf.async = 'true';
    var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    s.parentNode.insertBefore(wf, s);
  })(); </script></div></div></div>  </div>

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1438974002' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id="file-460291" class="file file-html file-html-embed">

          <h2 class="element-invisible"><a href="">f77f9f575dcbb45788e8a961b963504a</a></h2>
      
  
  <div class="content">
    <div class="file-info"></div><div class="field field-name-field-html-code field-type-text-long field-label-hidden view-mode-full"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><style>
nav#block-boxes-1438973410 {
    width: 100%;
}
#block-boxes-1446218667 {
    border-top: 1px solid #ccc!important;
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #block-os-primary-menu{
top:15px!important;
}
.webkit .not-front #columns {
    margin-top: 80px;
}
.os-image-caption{
line-height:22px;
}
.page-news #main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 0;
}
.page-news .node-title{
margin-bottom:0;
}
#boxes-box-1441905122 h1 a{
font-weight:bold;
}
.node-type-page .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb, .breadcrumb a {
    font-weight: normal;
}
.block-boxes-os_taxonomy_fbt.navigation ul {
    border-bottom: 1px solid #fff;
    border-left: 1px solid #fff;
    border-right: 1px solid #fff;
}
.view-id-os_profiles.view-display-id-page article h1 {

					<!--header regions beg-->
			<header id="header" class="clearfix" role="banner">

.block-boxes-os_slideshow_box{
background-color:#444!important;
}
.front #layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy h2{
font-size:80px!important;
}
#boxes-box-1439561771{
padding-left:25px;
padding-right:10px;
}
.front .region-content-top .block-inner{
width:100%;
}
#boxes-box-1438973447 {
padding-right:25px;
padding-left:25px;
}
}
@media (max-width: 768px){


.front #block-boxes-os-news-latest {
    margin-top: 20px!important;
}
.front #layout_3_1_overlay .slide-copy h2{
font-size:36px!important;
}

    font-size: 25px;
}

    min-height: 60px;
    width:90%;
}

    font-size: 25px;
}

    font-size: 18px;
    font-weight: 200;

    padding-right: 20px;
}

}

}

    margin: -70px 0 10px 125px!important;
}

</style></div></div></div>  </div>

                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Studio/Practical Courses                    </h1>
                </header>

									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-843816" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
      </div>

  
  
  </article>
</div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1466090905" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1466090905"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1466090905' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-1466090905-page' data-page='0' data-delta='1466090905' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-link sv-list-view-teaser sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><article id="node-723646" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20173x%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Acting and Authenticity</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 173X</strong><br /><strong>David Levine</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Farkas Hall 203<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>17015  <strong>Course ID: </strong>156461 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-and-authenticity" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting and Authenticity</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-1011551" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22TDM%20115%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Acting Shakespeare</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 115</strong><br /><strong>Remo Airaldi</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Meeting: TBD</strong><br /><strong>Location:</strong> <strong>TBD</strong><br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>19120 <strong>Course ID: </strong>119020  <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-shakespeare" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting Shakespeare</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-704516" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22scott%20zigler%22}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Acting Workshop: Comedy</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 116 </strong><br /><strong>Scott Zigler</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tues/Thurs, </strong>10:00am - 11:29am<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Loeb Drama Center, Room C<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>12589  <strong>Course ID: </strong>117460 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-workshop-comedy-0" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting Workshop: Comedy</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-704491" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20112%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Advanced Acting: Contemporary Texts</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

      <header class="node-header">

      <header class="node-header">

          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22frsemr%2034v%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Broadway Musicals: History and Performance</a>

  <div class="node-content">

    google: { families: [ 'Raleway:400,100,200,300,500,600,700,800,900:latin' ] }
  };

    var wf = document.createElement('script');
    wf.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https' : 'http') +

<article id="node-704526" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22TDM%20119B%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Vocal Production For Performers</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

<article id="node-704536" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20120%22}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">What's so Funny?: Introduction to Improvisational Comedy</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 120 </strong><br /><strong>Remo Airaldi</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>04:00pm - 06:59pm<br /><strong>Location</strong>: Farkas Hall, 303<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>16302  <strong>Course ID: </strong>160654 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/whats-so-funny-introduction-improvisational-comedy" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about What's so Funny?: Introduction to Improvisational Comedy</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>

      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON={%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A[%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22]%2C%22Facets%22%3A[]%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22VES%20137%22%2C%22DeepLink%22%3Afalse}" rel="bookmark" target="_top">[New Waves]</a>

          </header>

    width: 45%;
    z-index: 2;
}

    padding: 0;
}

					  <div class="breadcrumb"><a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/" >HOME</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/academics" >ACADEMICS</a> <span>&#47;</span> <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/course-list" >COURSE LIST</a> <span>&#47;</span> </div>

															<header id="main-content-header">
									<a name="main-content"></a>
                    <h1 id="page-title">
                      Theoretical Courses                    </h1>
                </header>
														
															<!--front panel regions beg-->
								<div id="content-panels" class="at-panel gpanel panel-display content clearfix">
									<div class="region region-content-top"><div class="region-inner clearfix"><div id="block-os-pages-main-content" class="block block-os-pages no-title"  module="os_pages" delta="main_content"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><article id="node-844046" class="node node-page article clearfix" role="article">
  
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
      </div>

  
  
  </article>
</div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1444329158" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_sv_list_box no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1444329158"><div class="block-inner clearfix">  
  
  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1444329158' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-1444329158-page' data-page='0' data-delta='1444329158' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-link sv-list-view-teaser sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><article id="node-723646" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20173x%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Acting and Authenticity</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 173X</strong><br /><strong>David Levine</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Farkas Hall 203<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>17015  <strong>Course ID: </strong>156461 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-and-authenticity" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting and Authenticity</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

  
  
  </article>
<article id="node-862981" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRH%3A2018%20Spring%3ATerm%22%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22derek%20miller%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">American Plays and Musicals, 1940-1960</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

<article id="node-1011666" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22181db%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Performance Activism</a>

          </header>

    background-color: #444!important;
}
#block-os-primary-menu {
    top: 0px !important;
}

background-color:#ccc!important;
}

    background: none repeat scroll 0 0 #fff;
}

    color: #000;
}

    border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc !important;
    border-top: 1px solid #fff !important;
}

    background-color: #000;
}

    min-height: 80px;
    width: 100%;
}

    min-height: inherit;
}

}

}

}
}

  <div class="block-content content"><div id='boxes-box-1444329158' class='boxes-box'><div class="boxes-box-content"><div id='box-1444329158-page' data-page='0' data-delta='1444329158' class='os-sv-list os_sv_list_box sv-list-link sv-list-view-teaser sv-list-layout-list sv-grid-3'><article id="node-723646" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22tdm%20173x%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Acting and Authenticity</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>
	<strong>TDM 173X</strong><br /><strong>David Levine</strong><br />2017 Fall<br /><strong>Tuesday, </strong>2:00pm - 3:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> Farkas Hall 203<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>17015  <strong>Course ID: </strong>156461 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/acting-and-authenticity" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Acting and Authenticity</span></a></p></div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-862981" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_DESCR_IS_SCL_DESCRH%3A2018%20Spring%3ATerm%22%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22derek%20miller%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">American Plays and Musicals, 1940-1960</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><p>

<article id="node-1026606" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
          <a href="https://courses.my.harvard.edu/psp/courses/EMPLOYEE/EMPL/h/?tab=HU_CLASS_SEARCH&SearchReqJSON=%7B%22PageNumber%22%3A1%2C%22PageSize%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SortOrder%22%3A%5B%22IS_SCL_SUBJ_CAT%22%5D%2C%22Facets%22%3A%5B%5D%2C%22Category%22%3A%22HU_SCL_SCHEDULED_BRACKETED_COURSES%22%2C%22SearchPropertiesInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22FacetsInResults%22%3Atrue%2C%22SaveRecent%22%3Atrue%2C%22TopN%22%3A%22%22%2C%22SearchText%22%3A%22frsemr%2034v%22%7D" rel="bookmark" target="_top">Broadway Musicals: History and Performance</a>
        </h1>
          </header>
  
  
  <div class="node-content">
    <div class="field field-name-body field-type-text-with-summary field-label-hidden view-mode-teaser"><div class="field-items"><div class="field-item even"><strong>FRSEMR 34V</strong><br /><strong>Carol Oja</strong><br />2018 Spring<br /><strong>Wednesday, </strong>3:00pm - 4:59pm<br /><strong>Location:</strong> TBA<br /><strong>Class Number: </strong>19635  <strong>Course ID: </strong>156241
	 <a href="https://tdm.fas.harvard.edu/links/broadway-musicals-history-and-performance" class="node-readmore" target="_top">Read more <span class="element-invisible"> about Broadway Musicals: History and Performance</span></a></div></div></div>  </div>

<article id="node-1039691" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">

    margin-left: 70px !important;
}

.front #box-os_news_latest-page .node-content{
padding-left:55px;
}
#box-os_events_upcoming-page .node-content {
    padding-left: 0px !important;
}
#main-content span.date-display-single {
    padding-left: 70px;
}
}
</style></div></div></div>  </div>

  
</div>
</div></div></div>
  </div></div><div id="block-boxes-1438973328" class="block block-boxes block-boxes-os_boxes_media no-title"  module="boxes" delta="1438973328"><div class="block-inner clearfix">

<article id="node-1011681" class="node node-link node-teaser article clearfix" role="article" target="_top">
  
      <header class="node-header">
              <h1 class="node-title" rel="nofollow">
